title: Gameday Audio: Listening to Gameday audio by tapping on headphones icon
custom_preconds:
Given there are active games
And these games have audio
custom_steps:
When you tap on the headphones the audio pop over will appear showing the active games with audio
And when you tap on an active game
custom_expected:
Then audio should begin playing

**REPEAT for all audio streams for that game**

title: Gameday Audio: Listening to Gameday Audio from the scoreboard
custom_preconds: Given that there are active games with audio
custom_steps:
When you go to the scoreboard
And tap on an active game with audio
And tap the audio feed
custom_expected:
Then audio should begin to play

**REPEAT for all audio feeds for that game**

title: Gameday Audio: Playing Gameday audio over WiFi
custom_preconds:
Given that there is an active game with audio
And the device is connected via WiFi only
custom_steps:
When you go to audio icon (headphones)
And tap an active game
And choose an audio feed to play
custom_expected: Then audio should begin to play

title: Gameday Audio: Verify audio can be played over carrier network
custom_preconds:
Given that there are active games available with audio
And you are using a device that is connected to the carrier network only
custom_steps:
When you go to the audio icon (headphones)
And select an active game
And choose an audio feed
custom_expected: Then audio should begin to play

title: Gameday Audio: Verify audio can be played with a carrier and wifi connection
custom_preconds:
Given that there are active games available with audio
And you are using a device that is connected to the carrier network & a wifi connection
custom_steps:
When you go to audio icon (headphones)
And tap an active game
And choose an audio feed to play
custom_expected: Then audio should begin to play

title: Gameday Audio: Playing other audio (not related to the app) while Gameday audio is already playing
custom_preconds:
Given gameday audio is available
And other audio (not related to the app) is also available
custom_steps:
When you start gameday audio
And background the app
And go to another audio source like the device's music player & begin to play audio
custom_expected:
Then gameday audio should stop playing
And the most recent selection of audio will begin to play

title: Gameday Audio: Playing audio while navigating throughout the app
custom_steps:
When you start gameday audio
And navigate throughout the app by going to the scoreboard, news & standings pages
custom_expected:
Then audio should continue to play 
And all the pages should load as expected

title: Gameday Audio: Playing in the background
custom_preconds: Given that there is gameday audio available to be played
custom_steps:
When you start gameday audio
And background the app
custom_expected: Then audio will continue to play
